channel.title: NCM:SIFY on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in NCM:SIFY on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: Sify Data-Center Unit Is Said to Plan $500 Million India IPO
item.description: Sify Technologies Ltd.’s data-center unit is preparing to submit a preliminary filing with the Indian regulator for an initial public offering that may fetch $500 million, according to people familiar
